mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO EDUCATION ( PK_MANAGER_SEQ, EDUCATION_NAME, SUB_START_DT, SUB_END_DT, EDUCATION_TEST, EDUCATION_TEST_DT, REGIST_ID, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #{pkManagerSeq}, #{educationName}, #{subStartDt}, #{subEndDt}, #{educationTest}, #{educationTestDt}, #{registId}, SYSDATE() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS returnId
INSERT INTO EDUCATION_STUD ( PK_EDUCATION_SEQ, PK_USER_SEQ, REGIST_ID, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #{pkEducationSeq}, #{pkUserSeq}, #{registId}, SYSDATE() )

INSERT INTO SUBJECT ( PK_EDUCATION_SEQ, PK_MANAGER_SEQ, SUBJECT_NAME, SUB_START_DT, SUB_END_DT, REGIST_ID, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #{pkEducationSeq}, #{pkManagerSeq}, #{subjectName}, #{subStartDt}, #{subEndDt}, #{registId}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ AS pkEducationSeq, A.PK_MANAGER_SEQ AS pkManagerSeq, B.NAME AS name, A.EDUCATION_NAME AS educationName, CASE A.EDUCATION_STATE WHEN 'A' THEN '준비' WHEN 'B' THEN '진행' WHEN 'C' THEN '완료' ELSE EDUCATION_STATE END AS educationState, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(A.SUB_START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(SUB_END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d')) AS educationDt, DATE_FORMAT(A.SUB_START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS subStartDt, DATE_FORMAT(A.SUB_END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS subEndDt, A.REGIST_ID AS registId, DATE_FORMAT(A.REGIST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS registDt, A.UPDATE_ID AS updateId, A.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(PK_USER_SEQ SEPARATOR ',') FROM EDUCATION_STUD SA WHERE SA.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ = #{pkEducationSeq}) AS pkUserSeqArray FROM EDUCATION A INNER JOIN MANAGER B ON A.PK_MANAGER_SEQ = B.PK_MANAGER_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ = #{pkEducationSeq} ORDER BY A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDUCATION A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ ASC

SELECT A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ AS pkEducationSeq, A.PK_MANAGER_SEQ AS pkManagerSeq, B.NAME AS name, A.EDUCATION_NAME AS educationName, CASE A.EDUCATION_STATE WHEN 'A' THEN '준비' WHEN 'B' THEN '진행' WHEN 'C' THEN '완료' ELSE A.EDUCATION_STATE END AS educationState, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(A.SUB_START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(A.SUB_END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d')) AS educationDt, A.REGIST_ID AS registId, DATE_FORMAT(A.REGIST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS registDt, A.UPDATE_ID AS updateId, A.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt FROM EDUCATION A INNER JOIN MANAGER B ON A.PK_MANAGER_SEQ = B.PK_MANAGER_SEQ WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ ASC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT C.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ AS pkEducationSeq, B.EDUCATION_NAME AS subjectState, C.SUBJECT_NAME AS subjectName, C.PK_SUBJECT_SEQ AS pkSubjectSeq FROM EDUCATION_STUD A JOIN EDUCATION B ON A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ = B.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ JOIN SUBJECT C ON A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ = C.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ WHERE A.PK_USER_SEQ = #{pkUserSeq} ORDER BY A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ, C.SUB_START_DT

SELECT C.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ AS pkEducationSeq, B.EDUCATION_NAME AS subjectState, C.SUBJECT_NAME AS subjectName, C.PK_SUBJECT_SEQ AS pkSubjectSeq FROM EDUCATION B JOIN SUBJECT C ON B.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ = C.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ ORDER BY C.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ, C.SUB_START_DT

SELECT A.PK_EDUCATION_STUD_SEQ AS pkEducationStudSeq, A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ AS pkEducationSeq, B.EDUCATION_NAME AS educationName, A.PK_USER_SEQ AS pkUserSeq, C.NAME AS name, C.PHONE AS phone, C.BIRTHDAY AS birthday, A.ATTEND_DIVN AS attendDivn, A.ATTEND_DT AS attendDt, A.EARLY_DIVN AS earlyDivn, A.EARLY_DT AS earlyDt, A.LATE_DIVN AS lateDivn, A.LATE_DT AS lateDt, A.RELAX_DIVN AS relaxDivn, A.RELAX_DT AS relaxDt, A.ABSENT_DIVN AS absentDivn, A.ABSENT_DT AS absentDt, A.OUT_DIVN AS outDivn, A.OUT_DT AS outDt, A.IN_DT AS inDt, A.REGIST_ID AS registId, A.REGIST_DT AS registDt, A.UPDATE_ID AS updateId, A.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt FROM EDUCATION_STUD A INNER JOIN EDUCATION B ON A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ = B.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ INNER JOIN USER C ON A.PK_USER_SEQ = C.PK_USER_SEQ WHERE 1=1
AND A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ IN (SELECT WA.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ FROM SUBJECT WA WHERE WA.PK_MANAGER_SEQ IN (#{pkManagerSeq}))
AND A.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ IN (SELECT WA.PK_EDUCATION_SEQ FROM EDUCATION_STUD WA WHERE WA.PK_USER_SEQ IN (#{pkUserSeq}))
mapper.update: UPDATE EDUCATION SET PK_MANAGER_SEQ = #{pkManagerSeq}, EDUCATION_NAME = #{educationName}, SUB_START_DT = #{subStartDt}, SUB_END_DT = #{subEndDt}, UPDATE_ID = #{registId}, UPDATE_DT = NOW() WHERE PK_EDUCATION_SEQ = #{pkEducationSeq}
